fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may bring Peace upon town at night, reducing every player's attack down to None for the night. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Attackers are told they couldn't bring themselves to attack anybody that night; however, they still visit their target.
- If the attack would use a charge, that charge is not used.
- This ability has a one night cooldown, other Peacemakers are hit with this cooldown if another used their ability the night before.
- Astral Attacks are completely immune to your Peace.
- Roleblock and Control immune.
